entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fluent Api ignores supplied propertyName #31813
  • EFCore 8 Preview7 - RelationalTypeMapping for a parameter doesn't seem correct while updating Json field #31807
  • Stylecop rulesets are being applied on generated EF bundle and build is failing in gitlab pipleine #31804

Closed

  • System.ArgumentException on List<T> with OwnsOne ToJson #31760
    8.0.0
  • How to get the more info related to the thrown exception #31729

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31811
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Store sentinel values as provider values in the compiled model #31810
  • Discover ComplexTypeAttribute on nested complex types #31808

Merged

  • Bump NetTopologySuite.IO.GeoJSON from 3.0.0 to 4.0.0 #31792
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [SMALL] Fix to #31760 - System.ArgumentException on List<T> with OwnsOne ToJson #31801
  • Rename "country" #31806
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31800
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to RTM #31799

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Support BigInteger, Int128 & UInt128 #31778
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30996 - Incorrect translation of comparison of current value with owned type default value #31742
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Switch to interpreted client-evaluation in parameter extractor #31784
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.23
